content.en: Probabilistic record linkage: Researchers have developed and tested a methodology for using probabilistic linkage technology to link large public health databases. They have also analyzed the performance of different demographic variables for making linkages between patient registry records. In addition, a study employed an estimator function using the Expectation Maximization (EM) algorithm to develop a probabilistic record linkage technique without human review.
content.da: Probabilistisk registerkobling: Forskere har udviklet og testet en metodik til at bruge probabilistisk koblingsteknologi til at koble store offentlige sundhedsdatabaser. De har også analyseret ydeevnen af forskellige demografiske variabler til at skabe koblinger mellem patientregistre. Derudover anvendte en undersøgelse en estimatorfunktion ved brug af Expectation Maximization (EM) algoritmen til at udvikle en probabilistisk registerkoblingsteknik uden menneskelig gennemgang.
